countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: The telephone country code linked to your eWeLink account (without the +).

username.title: Username
username.description: The phone number or email address linked to your eWeLink account.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for your eWeLink account.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If enabled, more information will be added to the Homebridge log.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: You can group channels of multi-switch devices to simulate another accessory instead of having each switch separately. Currently only 'blind' (WindowCovering) is supported.

type.title: Type
type.description: A description of this group. Currently must be 'blind'.

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: Device ID from your eWeLink app.

relay_up.title: Relay Up
relay_up.description: Relay number for the up motor.

relay_down.title: Relay Down
relay_down.description: Relay number for the down motor.

time_up.title: Time Up
time_up.description: Total time in seconds to fully open blinds (from closed).

time_down.title: Time Down
time_down.description: Total time in seconds to completely close blinds (from open).

time_botton_margin_up.title: Time Bottom Margin Up
time_botton_margin_up.description: Please refer to this link for more information about this setting.

time_botton_margin_down.title: Time Bottom Margin Down
time_botton_margin_down.description: Please refer to this link for more information about this setting.

layout.title: Optional
layout.description: Only adjust these settings if you know what you are doing.
